term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - lithometeor in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: lithometeor

item.text: A particle of dry substance in the atmosphere, as contrasted to a hydrometeor.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2199 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
